page.title: 13The Urdd
page.content: The{Urdd}is an organisation for young {Welsh}people. There are three mottos in the Urdd; to be faithful to Wales, to be faithful to all people, to be faithful to{Christ.}There is an Urdd club which is held after school. It costs you 80p to join each year. If you join you can go to{Llangrannog, the Urdd camp in{Dyfed,}for a week each year and you can take part in the{Urdd Eisteddfod.}At{Llangrannog, which is near the sea, you{speak Welsh at all times. You can visit the nearby beach, walk through the countryside, swim in the swimming pool, trampoline, ride horses,take part in B.M.X rally, play all kinds of sports and enjoy the evenings in concerts, an eisteddfod and discos.
